abstract: Citadel Investment Group has made another key hire from JPMorgan Chase, taking global co-head of securitized products Bill King to lead its own securitized product business.
lead_paragraph: Citadel Investment Group has made another key hire from JPMorgan Chase, taking global co-head of securitized products Bill King to lead its own securitized product business.

headline.main: Citadel Nabs Another Wall Street Banker

abstract: This is Bear Stearns‘s last day on Earth. The shareholder meeting to approve the acquisition by JPMorgan Chase is at 10 a.m. I assume that immediately after the acquisition is approved, Bear will be merged out of existence as a public company.
lead_paragraph: This is Bear Stearns‘s last day on Earth. The shareholder meeting to approve the acquisition by JPMorgan Chase is at 10 a.m. I assume that immediately after the acquisition is approved, Bear will be merged out of existence as a public company.

abstract: It’s official: A majority of Bear Stearns shareholders on Thursday voted in favor of the securities firm’s sale to JPMorgan Chase. The approval — which was essentially a forgone conclusion, if only because JPMorgan already owned nearly half of Bear’s stock — clears the way for Bear to be subsumed into JPMorgan, ending its 85-year history as an independent entity. More than half of Bear’s employees are expected to lose their jobs in the sale, which was hastily arranged in March to avoid a complete collapse of the firm.
lead_paragraph: It’s official: A majority of Bear Stearns shareholders on Thursday voted in favor of the securities firm’s sale to JPMorgan Chase. The approval — which was essentially a forgone conclusion, if only because JPMorgan already owned nearly half of Bear’s stock — clears the way for Bear to be subsumed into JPMorgan, ending its 85-year history as an independent entity. More than half of Bear’s employees are expected to lose their jobs in the sale, which was hastily arranged in March to avoid a complete collapse of the firm.
